pullrequest.title: Update dependencies based on feedback during package builds.

content.raw:
If this merges and I'm not around for it: When making the next bloom release run the following commands in the release repository to stop patching the package manifest.

```
#!bash
git rm -r prototype
sed -i 's:prototype:null:' tracks.yaml
git commit -m "Drop dependency patches now that they're upstreamed."
```
